attacks.name: Fire Fang
attacks.effect: Your opponent's Active Pokémon is now Burned.

attacks.name: Brave Burn-GX
attacks.effect: This attack does 150 damage to 1 of your opponent's Benched Pokémon. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.) (You can't use more than 1 GX attack in a game.)
